string.name: name
string.value: The Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world. This item cannot be used to teleport in between continents. Note: This item will disappear after one use.

string.name: name
string.value: Teleport Coke

string.name: desc
string.value: By drinking sweet refreshing #cCoca-Cola#, it ables you to #cteleport to one of the remembered maps#. You can also #cteleport to the map where specific character is located# in the same channel. Unable the teleport to the maps where teleport is limited.

string.name: name
string.value: Rookie Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: A rock that can memorize 5 maps, and then allow you to #cteleport to the memorized maps# at any time. It can be used to #cmove to the map where a particular character is# as long as they're in your world and channel.

string.name: name
string.value: Hyper Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to #cteleport to most other locations through the World Map [W]#. 
Also allows you to #cmove to a map where a specified character is# if they are in the same world and channel. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.
#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#
#cHenesys, Ellinia, Perion, Kerning City, Nautilus, Orbis, Ludibrium, Aquarium, Leafre, Mu Lung, Ariant, Edelstein#.

string.name: name
string.value: VIP Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: This Teleport Rock enables one to #cteleport between continents#. It also enables the user to teleport to a specific character from the same channel. Up to #c10# maps, excluding the maps that cannot be reached through teleport, can be registered for this. Note: This item will disappear after one use.

string.name: name
string.value: Premium VIP Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value: #cA rock which allows you to teleport between continents#. Within the same channel, you can teleport to a map where a particular character is. You can even teleport to a town that you have not yet visited. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.\n#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#\n#cHenesys, Ellinia, Perion, Kerning City, Nautilus, Orbis, Ludibrium, Aquarium, Leafre, Mu Lung, Ariant, Edelstein#.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cA rock which allows you to teleport between continents#. Within the same channel, you can teleport to a map where a particular character is. You can even teleport to a town that you have not yet visited. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.
#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#
#cHenesys,Ellinia,Perion,Kerning City,Nautilus,Orbis,Ludibrium,Aquarium,Leafre,Mu Lung,Ariant,Edelstein#. 
 Cooldown: 30 min

string.name: name
string.value: [7-Day] Premium VIP Teleport Rock

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cA rock which allows you to teleport between continents#. Within the same channel, you can teleport to a map where a particular character is. You can even teleport to a town that you have not yet visited. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.
#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#
#cHenesys,Ellinia,Perion,Kerning City,Nautilus,Orbis,Ludibrium,Aquarium,Leafre,Mu Lung,Ariant,Edelstein#.

string.name: name
string.value: [1-Day] World Map Warp Drive

string.name: desc
string.value: Warps you to your desired location on the World Map upon use. Just select your destination when the World Map appears. Warping only works in certain areas. \nCooldown: 30 min

string.name: name
string.value: [3-Day] World Map Warp Drive

string.name: desc
string.value: Warps you to your desired location on the World Map upon use. Just select your destination when the World Map appears. Warping only works in certain areas. \nCooldown: 30 min

string.name: name
string.value: [7-Day] World Map Warp Drive

string.name: desc
string.value: Warps you to your desired location on the World Map upon use. Just select your destination when the World Map appears. Warping only works in certain areas. \nCooldown: 30 min

string.name: name
string.value: AP Reset

string.name: desc
string.value: This #cscroll allows you to move 1 AP from one stat to another#. The lowest AP level that a stat can have is 5. Keep in mind that a Warrior's STR must be higher than 35, a Thief's DEX must be higher than 25, a Magician's INT must be higher than 20, a Bowman's DEX must be higher than 20, and a Pirate's DEX must be higher than 20.

string.name: name
string.value: SP Reset (1st job)

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 1st-job skill#. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 2nd or 3rd job skills.

string.name: name
string.value: SP Reset (2nd job)

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 2nd-level skill#. The 1st job SP raised AFTER the 2nd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 2nd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 3rd job skills.

string.name: name
string.value: SP Reset (3rd job)

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 3rd-level skill#. The 1st & 2nd job SP raised AFTER the 3rd job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st or 2nd job skills.

string.name: name
string.value: SP Reset (4th job)

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 4th-level skill#. The 1st, 2nd, and 3rd job SP raised AFTER the 4th job adv. can also be reset and applied to a 3rd job skill. The SP that's been reset may NOT be applied to 1st, 2nd or 3rd job skills.

string.name: name
string.value: Evan SP Reset (1st/2nd Skill)

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 1st or 2nd Job Skill.#

string.name: name
string.value: Evan SP Reset (3rd/4th Skill)

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 3rd or 4th Job Skill.#

string.name: name
string.value: Evan SP Reset (5th/6th Skill)

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 5th or 6th Job Skill.#

string.name: name
string.value: Evan SP Reset (7th/8th Skill)

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 7th or 8th Job Skill.#

string.name: name
string.value: Evan SP Reset (9th/10th Skill)

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 9th or 10th Job Skill.#

string.name: name
string.value: Item Tag

string.name: desc
string.value: This will enable the owner of the weapon to engrave his/her name on an equipment item once. Click on the item, and drag the item #con top of the equipment of choice# to engrave your character name on it.

string.name: name
string.value: Item Guard

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to seal non-quest items from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, or scrolled#. You can seal an item by double-clicking on the lock.

string.name: desc
string.value: An equipment needed to open the #ceggs from pigme#. Pigme eggs canve incubated by double clicking the incubator.

string.name: name
string.value: Peanut Machine

string.name: desc
string.value: An odd-looking contraption that cracks #cPeanuts#. Double-click the Peanut Machine to use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A device used to melt #cIce Cubes#. Double-click the microwave to use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A device needed to #chatch a Pygmy Egg#. You can hatch a Pygmy Egg by double clicking on the Incubator. The Incubator will give you a better chance of obtaining valuable items.

string.name: name
string.value: Magic Music Box

string.name: desc
string.value: A jeweled music box that once belonged to a legendary hero of the past. Can be opened with a #cHero's Key#, dropped by monsters and sold at Elluel General Store. Use by double-clicking on the music box.

string.name: name
string.value: Item Guard : 7 Days

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to seal non-quest items from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, or scrolled#. Double-click on the lock and drag the item you would like to seal into the window that appears. #cItems are sealed for 7 days and cannot be unsealed before then.#

string.name: name
string.value: Item Guard : 30 Days

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to seal non-quest items from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, or scrolled#. Double-click on the lock and drag the item you would like to seal into the window that appears. #cItems are sealed for 30 days and cannot be unsealed before then.#

string.name: name
string.value: Item Guard : 90 days

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to seal non-quest items from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, or scrolled#. Double-click on the lock and drag the item you would like to seal into the window that appears. #cItems are sealed for 90 days and cannot be unsealed before then.#

string.name: name
string.value: Item Guard : 365 Days

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to seal non-quest items from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, or scrolled#. Double-click on the lock and drag the item you would like to seal into the window that appears. #cItems are sealed for 365 days and cannot be unsealed before then.#

string.name: name
string.value: Miracle Cube

string.name: desc
string.value: A miraculous cube that resets the potential of a piece of equipment.\n#cIt can only be used on items with revealed potential#.

string.name: name
string.value: Premium Miracle Cube

string.name: desc
string.value: A miraculous cube that resets #cthe potential and number of potential stats# on any piece of equipment that is Rare, Epic, or Unique.\nThis cube #ccannot be used on Legendary items.#This cube can only be used on items with revealed potentials.

string.name: name
string.value: Super Miracle Cube

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious cube, said to bring out the hidden potential of equipment. Has a greater chance of raising equipment rank than the Miracle Cube. \n#cOnly usable on items from Rare to Legendary#\n#cMax Result: Legendary

string.name: name
string.value: 8th Anniversary Miracle Cube

string.name: desc
string.value: A miracle cube that can only be used on Maple 8th Anniversary Crimson equipment. It can reveal higher potentials than normal miracle cubes.

string.name: name
string.value: Luck's Key

string.name: desc
string.value: Feeling lucky? Increases the success rate of the next scroll use by 10%.

string.name: name
string.value: Shielding Ward

string.name: desc
string.value: A ward that protects an item. Using this on a piece of equipment protects it from being destroyed by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use, and it #ccannot be used on items that have been successfully enhanced 12 or more times.# \nCan be used along with #cShield Scrolls and Guardian Scrolls#.

string.name: name
string.value: Shield Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic ward that protects an item. Using this on a piece of equipment protects it from having its #cupgrade count# reduced by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection disappears even after a successful scroll use. \nCan be used along with #cShielding Wards and Guardian Scrolls#.

string.name: name
string.value: Perfect Innocence Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: #cResets# all stats on an item except for its potential. Can only be used on equipment. If used on an item that grows, the item may reset to its pre-growth state.

string.name: name
string.value: Guardian Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: A magic ward that protects a scroll when it fails. \nUsing this on a piece of equipment will allow you to keep the #cnext scroll used on it# when it fails #c1 time#. The protection effect disappears even after a successful scroll use.\nCan be used along with #cShielding Wards and Shield Scrolls#.

string.name: name
string.value: Rapid-Fire Fireworks

string.name: desc
string.value: Personal fireworks that launch really fast.\r\n#cWhen used, you can get ATT/Magic ATT +20, Accuracy +400, Weapon DEF +200, or Magic DEF +200. The effect lasts for 10 minutes.#

string.name: name
string.value: Pet Name Tag

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this item to name your pet. Call its name before making an order, and the pet responds much better to your command. \n ex. Lucky, sit!

string.name: name
string.value: Water of Life

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious water gathered from the deepest valleys of Ellinia. Double click the Water of Life to reawaken your pet, which has turned into a doll.

string.name: name
string.value: Item Pick-up Skill

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds the item pick-up skill to a pet. \n#cAvailable to pets that can only pick up Mesos.#

string.name: name
string.value: HP Charge Skill

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds to automatic potion-feeding skill to the pet. \n#cAvailable to all pets that do not have this option.#

string.name: name
string.value: Expand Range Skill

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to expand the pet's moving range by 3 times. \n#cOnly available to pets that have automatic pick-up skills, cannot be used on top of each other.#

string.name: name
string.value: Automatic Pick-Up Skill

string.name: desc
string.value: A skill that enables pets to pick up items and mesos within the area without the character having to move. \n#cAvailable to pets with Mesos pick-up, item pick-up skills.#

string.name: name
string.value: (+) Pick up Leftover Item & Meso Skills

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds the skill that enables pets to pick up mesos and items that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds, thus rendering it as leftovers.\n#cAvailable to pets that have Meso pick-up skills as well as item pick-up skills.#

string.name: name
string.value: Unpickable item skill

string.name: desc
string.value: The skill that makes pet not picking up any selected item. \n#s only pet mounted meso or item collecting function can use the skill.#

string.name: name
string.value: MP potion recharge skill

string.name: desc
string.value: The skill that automatically recharges one's MP provided you have set the option up in the system option. \n#c The skill applies to all pet that does not have the skillt#.

string.name: name
string.value: Pet Buff Auto Skill

string.name: desc
string.value: Choose the buff skill you want from the Skill window and drag it to the bottom of the Pet Equip tab. Once it's saved, the pet will use the chosen skill automatically. Cannot be used on certain skills.

string.name: name
string.value: (-) Delete Item Pick-Up

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items.

string.name: name
string.value: (-) Delete HP Charge

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable the pet from automatically feeding the character when the HP reaches critical stage.

string.name: name
string.value: (-)Delete Expand Range

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to return the range of pet's movement back to normal.

string.name: name
string.value: (-) Delete Automatic Pick-Up

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable the pet from picking up items and mesos.

string.name: name
string.value: (-) Delete Pick up Leftover Item & Meso

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable pets from picking up leftover items and mesos, the ones that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Get a random Cash Shop item when you open this box. Test your luck! After purchasing this item, open the box by double-clicking it in the Cash Inventory. Please keep in mind that you'll only be able to open the box in the Cash Inventory.

string.name: name
string.value: Starter Pack

string.name: desc
string.value: A Starter Pack containing 4 fixed Familiars. Only one can be purchased per account. This pack commemorates the introduction of Monster Familiars.\nContains 4 fixed Familiars: #c(Pig, Cloud Fox, Terrified Wild Boar and Red Drake# (Untradeable)\n#cOnly one can be purchased per account#

string.value: Booster Pack

string.name: desc
string.value: A pack that gives out 3 random Familiars total: 2 common and 1 uncommon or better. \n#cThe contents are determined by the system, and a Rare item is not always given. The chances of obtaining better items are not affected by the amount purchased. #

string.name: desc
string.value: Tasty-looking monkey banana. Only edible for the pet Monkey. \nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fresh set of batteries. Only usable with the pet Robot.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.value: Dog Bone

string.name: desc
string.value: A neatly-packaged dog bone. Only edible for the pet Puppy and Husky.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bamboo harvested from Ellinia forests. Only edible for the pet Panda.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Just caught at Lith Harbor. Only edible for the pet Kitty, Black Pig and Penguin.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A freshly-plucked clover. Only edible for the pet Bunny, Black Pig, and Rudolph.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.value: Red Meat

string.name: desc
string.value: Fresh red meat bought from the market. Only edible for the pet Dino, Mini Kargo, Black Pig, Orange Tiger and White Tiger.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: name
string.value: Frozen Fruits

string.name: desc
string.value: A frozen fruit that can only be eaten by #cMini Yeti and Black Pig#. Restores fullness and #cincreases closeness by 100#.

string.value: Turkey Feed

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Maple Life (A-Type)

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c*Warning: If you do not have an empty Character slot, it cannot be used.#

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world.You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status#.

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

string.name: name
string.value: Maple Life (B-Type)

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c*Warning : If all 12 character slots are full, it cannot be used.#

This package has the #cMaple Life item plus an Extra Character Slot coupon.#Using this item will automiatically create a new slot.

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world. You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status.#

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

string.name: name

string.value: Use this to access a general store from anywhere. You can purchase potions to recover HP & MP, throwing stars, and recharge bullets. Some maps restrict the use of this item, though.

string.name: name
string.value: Legendary Booster Pack

string.name: desc
string.value:
This booster pack gives out 3 Rare or higher Familiars. 
Level: Contains 3 Rare Familiars - one below Lv. 50, one below Lv. 100, and one Lv. 100 or higher. There is a small chance that a Lv. 1 - 200 Legendary Familiar might come out instead of the Lv. 100 or higher Rare Familiar. 
Rank: 1 Normal, 1 Normal or Special, and 1 Special or better. 
#cYou will receive a Volatile Legends Familiar Stamp upon using the item. Collect 20 of them to receive a Volatile Familiar Ticket that will allow you to get a Legendary Familiar. #The contents are determined by the system, and a Rare item is not always given. The chances of obtaining better items are not affected by the amount purchased.

#cHenesys, Ellinia, Perion, Kerning City, Nautilus, Orbis, Ludibrium, Aquarium, Leafre, Mu Lung, Ariant, Edelstein#.
